moreInfo:
This certification covers:

  • learning bash terminal commands for everything from navigating and manipulating system files, all the way to advanced usage.
  • the basics of relational databases.
  • querying db's for useful statistics

representing approximately 300 hours of work.

This certification covers:

  • HTML and CSS
  • Flexbox & Grid
  • Best practices for accessibility and design
  • Modern techniques like CSS variables

representing approximately 300 hours of work.

During this course the participant studied the following topics:

  • Java Basics
  • Objects & Object Oriented Principles
  • Error handling
  • Testing & Unit tests
  • Strings & Enums
  • Annotations & Serialization
  • Generics
  • Collections
  • Working with dates
  • Concurrency
  • Stream API & Lambda Expressions
  • I/O & JDBC

spanning over 6 months.

During this internship the participant had the opportunity to experience a complete development process of an app from inception to release:

  • How to use state-of-the-art development tools
  • Designing and architecting an app
  • Breaking down the workload and estimating it
  • Implementing the functionalities, using best practices and the latest technologies for every platform
  • How to use a continuous integration tool
  • How to work in a team (including reviewing each other's code and interacting with other team members working on different components)
  • Learning how to make a presentation
  • Understanding what the work culture and an IT company environment means
  • Demoing the work to clients

over a time span of 6 weeks.
